description: These lettuce cups are bursting with spicy beef and make a perfect addition to an Asian inspired feast.
name: Thai Style Beef Lettuce Cups Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 red chillies, deseeded and finely chopped
3 heads little gem lettuce, leaves separated

recipeInstructions.text: In a large frying pan on a high heat, drizzle the oil and cook the ginger, garlic and chillies for 1 minute, add the mince and cook for 7 minutes until sealed and beginning to brown.
Pour over the lime juice and fish sauce and sprinkle in the coconut sugar, cook for 3 minutes until sticky and reduced.
Spoon the beef mince into the lettuce leaves, top with chopped peanuts and coriander and serve.
